            <string language="hu-HU">Hogyan mozog a Föld a Nap körül?</string>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como a terra se move em torno do sol?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come la terra si muove intorno al sole?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς η γη κινείται γύρω από τον ήλιο;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo la tierra se mueve alrededor del sol?</string>
